actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 95-297.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #233 (387-6).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation discharged in Senate.
Measure passed Senate, amended, in lieu of S. 1347.
House agreed to Senate amendments with amendments.

official_title: A bill to establish qualifications for individuals appointed to the National Advisory Committee on Oceans and Atmosphere and to authorize appropriations for the committee for fiscal year 1978.
short_title: National Advisory Committee on Oceans and Atmosphere Act

summary.as: House agreed to Senate amendment with amendment
summary.text: (House agreed to Senate amendments with amendments) National Advisory Committee on Oceans and Atmosphere Act - Establishes a National Advisory Committee on Oceans and Atmosphere to conduct a continuing review of national ocean and marine policy and coastal zone management programs and to advise the Secretary of Commerce with respect to administration of the programs of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration. Directs the Committee to submit an annual report on the status of national marine and atmospheric activities to Congress and the President. Authorizes the appropriation of $520,000 for fiscal year 1978 to carry out the provisions of this Act. Stipulates that such advisory committee shall replace an advisory committee with similar functions and duties established in 1971.

titles.title: National Advisory Committee on Oceans and Atmosphere Act
A bill to establish qualifications for individuals appointed to the National Advisory Committee on Oceans and Atmosphere and to authorize appropriations for the committee for fiscal year 1978.
